amendment.description: Amendment establishes the sense of congress that international cooperation should be encouraged where possible in regards to cyber security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 113-41 to establish the sense of congress that international cooperation should be encouraged where possible in regards to cyber security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Paulsen.
